org.springframework.data.map

类 MapKeyValueAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.keyvalue.core.AbstractKeyValueAdapter
      • org.springframework.data.map.MapKeyValueAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DisposableBean, KeyValueAdapter

    public class MapKeyValueAdapter
extends AbstractKeyValueAdapter
    KeyValueAdapter implementation for Map.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MapKeyValueAdapter()
      Create new MapKeyValueAdapter using ConcurrentHashMap as backing store type.
      MapKeyValueAdapter(Class<? extends Map> mapType)
      Creates a new MapKeyValueAdapter using the given Map as backing store.
      MapKeyValueAdapter(Map<String,Map<Object,Object>> store)
      Create new instance of MapKeyValueAdapter using given dataStore for persistence.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clear()
      Removes all objects.

      Check if a object with given id exists in keyspace.
      long count(String keyspace)
      Count number of objects within keyspace.
      Object delete(Object id, String keyspace)
      Delete and return the object with given type and id.
      void deleteAllOf(String keyspace)
      Remove all objects of given type.
      void destroy()
      Invoked by a BeanFactory on destruction of a singleton.
      org.springframework.data.util.CloseableIterator<Map.Entry<Object,Object>> entries(String keyspace)
      Returns a CloseableIterator that iterates over all entries.
      Object get(Object id, String keyspace)
      Get the object with given id from keyspace.
      Collection<?> getAllOf(String keyspace)
      Get all elements for given keyspace.
      protected Map<Object,Object> getKeySpaceMap(String keyspace)
      Get map associated with given key space.
      Object put(Object id, Object item, String keyspace)
      Add object with given id to keyspace.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MapKeyValueAdapter

        public MapKeyValueAdapter()
        Create new MapKeyValueAdapter using ConcurrentHashMap as backing store type.

      • MapKeyValueAdapter

        public MapKeyValueAdapter(Class<? extends Map> mapType)
        Creates a new MapKeyValueAdapter using the given Map as backing store.
        参数:
        mapType - must not be null.

      • MapKeyValueAdapter

        public MapKeyValueAdapter(Map<String,Map<Object,Object>> store)
        Create new instance of MapKeyValueAdapter using given dataStore for persistence.
        参数:
        store - must not be null.

    • 方法详细资料

      • put

        public Object put(Object id,
                  Object item,
                  String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Add object with given id to keyspace.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        keyspace - must not be null.
        返回:
        the item previously associated with the id.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Object id,
                        String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Check if a object with given id exists in keyspace.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        keyspace - must not be null.
        返回:
        true if item of type with id exists.

      • count

        public long count(String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Count number of objects within keyspace.
        参数:
        keyspace - must not be null.
        返回:

      • get

        public Object get(Object id,
                  String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Get the object with given id from keyspace.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        keyspace - must not be null.
        返回:
        null in case no matching item exists.

      • delete

        public Object delete(Object id,
                     String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Delete and return the object with given type and id.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        keyspace - must not be null.
        返回:
        null if object could not be found

      • getAllOf

        public Collection<?> getAllOf(String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Get all elements for given keyspace.
        参数:
        keyspace - must not be null.
        返回:
        empty Collection if nothing found.

      • entries

        public org.springframework.data.util.CloseableIterator<Map.Entry<Object,Object>> entries(String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Returns a CloseableIterator that iterates over all entries.
        参数:
        keyspace - must not be null.
        返回:

      • deleteAllOf

        public void deleteAllOf(String keyspace)
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Remove all objects of given type.
        参数:
        keyspace - must not be null.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        从接口复制的说明: KeyValueAdapter
        Removes all objects.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
             throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: DisposableBean
        Invoked by a BeanFactory on destruction of a singleton.
        抛出:
        Exception - in case of shutdown errors. Exceptions will get logged but not rethrown to allow other beans to release their resources too.

        Get map associated with given key space.
        参数:
